name: Tactiviral
description:
Tactiviral is a tactical game inspired by a called Anti-Virus by Smart Games and the tactical-RPG genre. 

In this game, you will fight in 1 vs 1 with little cells disposed on a board. Each turn, these cells can move using their movement points. After the turn ends, they attack nearby ennemy cells ! 

One player is the attacker : they must take the red cell (the Virus) to the red spot in the rifght of the board. The other player, the defender, must kill the Virus. 

This game was made in 4 days (around 32 hours) as a final exam for my school. The topic was about mixing Anti-Virus and a tactical-RPG game.
